arts.ttl: ‘Must not be selfish’ – Diego Simeone critical of Atlético star after Mallorca victory
arts.sum: Atlético Madrid head coach Diego Simeone has revealed his frustration with the actions of Rodrigo Riquelme, during the club’s latest outing. Atléti marked their return to action earlier today, making…

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid wins at Mallorca to regain 3rd place in Spanish league
arts.sum: Julián Álvarez scored a second-half winner as Atletico Madrid moved back into third place in the Spanish league with a 1-0 victory at Mallorca on Sunday. Marc Bartra scored a stoppage-time equalizer as seventh-place Real Betis salvaged a 2-2 home draw against 10th-place Celta Vigo.

arts.ttl: Laura Hamilton: “I’ve always loved Mallorca, I just wished I’d bought here earlier...”
arts.sum: Q.— Laura, you’ve spent 12 years travelling pretty much everywhere in the world presenting A Place in the Sun helping people buy houses overseas, why did you decide to buy your first overseas property project in Mallorca? It’s interesting because I always thought that if I was going to buy a property it would be near or right on the coast, on the beach, but I opted for Pollensa because I wanted somewhere which was going to be all year round.

arts.ttl: In form Atletico Madrid star earns Spain U21 recall
arts.sum: Atletico Madrid star Pablo Barrios has been recalled to the Spain U21 squad following an impressive run of form for Los Rojiblancos. Head coach Santi Denia has brought Barrios back into the La Roja fold after missing the last four U21 games due to injury.
